If the door gasket is damaged, suggest the customer replace it themselves
If the door Handle is damaged, suggest the customer replace it themselves
technician: Door Replacement Steps.
1.Before replacing any parts, the module must be removed for servicing.

customer: If the unit is not working,asking the customer to record a Video and send it to us for analysis.(Make sure to upload it into the system)

If the unit is not displaying anything.
The display does not turn on after switching on the power, ask the customer to try a different power outlet to ensure the outlet has power output.

Operation mode
1.When the power switch is turned on, the display shows the temperature
2.When the thermostat is turned on, the heating element and blower fan start operating.

.
technician:
The display is not working.
1.Confirm if the power switch has electrical output（If there is voltage input but no voltage output, the power switch is likely faulty）
2.Check whether the terminal block is burned or damaged.
3.Test the display to see if it is receiving voltage input. If there is voltage but no display, the display is likely defective.​
4.Check whether the wiring harness is loose or damaged.

The unit is not heating
1.Check if the heating element is receiving power（If there is voltage but it’s not working, replace the heating element ）
2.Check whether the terminal block is burned or damaged.
3.Test the display to see if it is receiving voltage input. If there is voltage but no display, the display is likely defective.​
4.Check whether the wiring harness is loose or damaged.

.
